metadata.title: CVE-2015-8239 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The SHA-2 digest support in the sudoers plugin in sudo after 1.8.7 allows local users with write permissions to parts of the called command to replace them before it is executed.

notes.note: sbeattie> command digests are available only in 1.8.7 and higher

criterions.comment: sudo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1').
